ovdesc.p: Definition for calculating commission for the LC amount on periodic basis and calculation type i.e. band or level.

desc.p: Short description for the periodic commission.
Specifies the calculation type to be used Level or Band.
Specifies the number of days for associated commission code
Final period should have rest period with value ‘R’ or R-Number of days
Valid FT.COMMISSION.TYPE record for each period.
Minimum Number of days for which the commission is calculated.
E.g if tenure of contract is 20 days and minimum period is defined as 30 days then commission should be calculated for 30 days.
Number of grace days for which commission will not be applied defined as rest period.
E,g if tenure of contract is 92 days and if there are 2 bands defined
If grace period is 2 days then commission will be calculated for 90 days.
Calculation base using which commission will be calculated.
